programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep40
programme.desc: The Fast And The Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protégé./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Nova’s toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers - When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who'S There?/Tour Guide Of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isn’t interested…

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Bad Luck Branch/ Gem Day - Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branch’s Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique ‘Gem’), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branch’s gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Queen Of The Castle/Truth Or Dare - Poppy attempts to complete her Dad’s abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didn’t take the tides into consideration. Now she’s in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Friend Matching/Trolly Tales 3 - When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Village’s babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Apple Of My Ire/Funsgiving - After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far…

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch A Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Cj Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/Bfff - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesn’t believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Switcher-Ruby/Bye Bye Bunker - Poppy and Branch switch bodies, and learn to appreciate each other’s point of view. /When Branch decides it’s time for him to move out of the bunker, Poppy tries to be as supportive as she can, even though it seems Branch himself may have some doubts.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep10
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods/Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep41
programme.desc: In Dreams - When Puss asks the second witch sister Malaranea for her gem, she casts a spell that makes him a prisoner in his dreams and only Dulcinea can save him

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep42
programme.desc: Fluteus Maximus - When Puss approaches the third witch sister Maliflua, he discovers she is actually the Piper and that a fourth witch is much closer than ever imagined

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep50
programme.desc: Blindsided - A huge storm hits Dragon's Edge causing the Dragons to spook and run off but when Astrid is blinded, Hiccup must lead her to Stormfly.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep51
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 1 - Hiccup doesn't know who to trust when Viggo and Ryker each tell him that the other has gone rogue, and is sidetracked when a new dragon attacks.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep51
programme.desc: Turbo Does Laundry Part 1/Part 2 - An exciting two-part episode of connected mini-stories following the crew that ends with Silent But Deadly and Thora deactivating a stink bomb.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep52
programme.desc: 137 Hours/Stalks On A Plane - Smoove ditches the crew and gets trapped in a clubhouse; the crew goes to ridiculous lengths to beat each other in a radio station contest.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep53
programme.desc: The Strife Aquatic - After fleeing the kingdom, King Julien and Maurice discover an unwanted visitor; Sage takes Clover to meet his master; Koto makes everyone his slave

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep54
programme.desc: The Most Eggcellent Adventure - King Julien and Maurice arrive on an island full of lady lemurs; Sage and Clover pick out Clover's “emotional support hawk”; Mort gains intel on Koto

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep25
programme.desc: Peril Patch / Sibling Quibbling - When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep26
programme.desc: Musical Thrones / Branch Burn - Poppy hosts the biggest contest of the year for the chance to with a cool new hug watch/The Snack Pack go on a Caterbus road-trip and get sucked into a wormhole

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep51
programme.desc: The Obelisk - When time is running out for Puss to find the Obelisk, he must fight El Moco and finds out who The One from the Great Prophecy is

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep52
programme.desc: The Bloodwolf - When Puss is dealing with the apparent loss of Dulcinea, the mighty fear-eating Bloodwolf arrives and brings out Puss's greatest fears

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep51
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 1 - Hiccup doesn't know who to trust when Viggo and Ryker each tell him that the other has gone rogue, and is sidetracked when a new dragon attacks.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep52
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 2 - An extremely powerful new dragon attacks Dragon's Edge, and Hiccup makes a dangerous alliance while the fate of the Dragon Eye hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Rupert & The Missing Music - Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to make their band instruments play better but the spell goes wrong. The colourful musical notes fly away, leaving them with instruments that make no sound.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Rupert And The Weather Machine - When it starts raining sausages in Nutwood Rupert and friends fly up to the Cloud Shepherd's home to find out what has happened to the weather machine.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Noise - Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it… he sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep25
programme.desc: Postman Pat'S Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep26
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep77
programme.desc: Fifi'S Busy Day - Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep78
programme.desc: Dingaling Poppy - Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep2
programme.desc: Disarmed & Dangerous / Frankenleftovers - Disarmed and Dangerous When Mantha's arm falls off, her replacement limb turns out to be a monstrous tentacle! Frankenleftovers Casper gets a seemingly impossible class assignment—to create life!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep13
programme.desc: The Black Paladin - Voltron charges toward Zarkon's massive ship. When Shiro loses control of the Black Lion, the team must figure out a new way to defeat the Galra.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep13
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Four - When Fearless Leader uses the monster Humongalon to force everyone to surrender the world to him, Rocky and Bullwinkle try to stop them in the most massive monster battle ever

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chicken At Sea / The Key Master - Archibald hits the high seas to help out endangered turtles. It's Archibald to the rescue when the citizens of Crackridge report a series of thefts.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Frenzied Farts Of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep1
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep1
programme.desc: King Me - Uncle King Julien abdicates his throne, handing off his crown to Prince Julien. Let the reign of King Julien the Thirteenth begin.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep1
programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep1
programme.desc: Ty And Revvit - Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Olivia Ep1
programme.desc: Olivia Plays The Piano - Olivia sees herself as a great concert pianist, though her piano teacher thinks she needs a little more practice. But when her little brother Ian begins taking his own piano lessons – and turns out to be pretty good – Olivia isn't sure if there's room for two prodigies in the family.

programme.title: Olivia Ep2
programme.desc: Olivia Plays Football - Francine is chosen to play goalie, and Olivia is disappointed that she doesn't get to wear the red goalie jersey. Even worse, the uniform she designs for herself only causes chaos and confusion among her teammates. But when Francine is better at dodging the ball than stopping it, it's up to Olivia to put on the red goalie jersey and save the day

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep1
programme.desc: Flash The Marshall - Mr Carburettor is going to ban Flash from Silver hatch unless he learns how to do something useful. Can Flash learn how to be a good marshal in time?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep2

The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep116
programme.desc: The Thinking Squad - Clues house! While playing "superheroes" we hear a super strange noise. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where it's coming from. On the way, we learn about the powers our Superfriends have too!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Fire Alarm Blaze - There's a fire on the bridge, and it's too much for the Fire Chief and his team to handle. They need Firefighting Blaze to help. With time running out, Blaze hurries across town. But can he get to the bridge in time?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep806
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer - Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save Tilly Turbot / Pups Save an Upset Elephant - The Paw Patrol must rescue Cap'n Turbot and Francois' Grandma Tilly after she rides off on a Dolphin. // Carlos and Tracker calls the Paw Patrol to help solve the mystery of a rumbling sound that's upsetting the Jungle elephants.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Dinobot/Forest Squad in Space - Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The supersized sunflower - Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Paddington and the Lost Gerbil / Paddington Earns a Ranger Badge - Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective - It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park. // DAN Drainpipe Dan is stealing Mrs. Brown's wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep522
programme.desc: Spider's Web - Ew! There's a spider in the house! Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep603
programme.desc: A Giant Harvest Day! - Holiday Cooks Molly and Gil, on a mission to save the town's Harvest Day (Thanksgiving) feast, must retrieve a Golden Tomato from magical Tall Tale Farms. But first, their food knowledge is tested by three guardians!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Spring is Here! - It's getting warmer outside, and the flowers are blooming - that must mean that spring is here! We play an outdoors game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do on the first day of spring.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Blue Makes a Movie with YOU! - Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Race Car Superstar - Blaze and AJ visit VelocityVille, a town full of race cars where everybody loves to go fast! When a snooty car named Speedrick traps all the other racers, Blaze must transform into a super-fast race car to free his new friends.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceañera, part 1 / Finceañera, part 2 - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep806
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer - Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent - Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep168
programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure - Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep901
programme.desc: Liberty Meets a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. // Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep702
programme.desc: Pups Save Election Day - When Mayor Humdinger runs for Mayor of Adventure Bay, his Mayor Mobile runs out of control, the Paw Patrol have to save the day!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and The Bad Swap - Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Paddington the Detective - DAN Drainpipe Dan is stealing Mrs. Brown's wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep26
programme.desc: The Puddle Badge - Happy sets his sights on a very questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in, much to the horror of Duggee and the other Squirrels - and the tiny citizens of Midgetropolis who live inside it!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them by putting on a Game Show, with some help hosting from his good friend Ladybug.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep28
programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and his old pal Rodeo Horse, who teaches them how to be cowhands... and earn their Round Up Badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: Big Ben, England - The Go Jetters visit London on New Year's Eve, but Big Ben is missing! To the Vroomster!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Chichen Itza, Mexico - Grandmaster Glitch's giant ball game threatens El Castillo in Chichen Itza, Mexico, so the Go Jetters attempt to save it.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep42
programme.desc: Magnets - Kit and Pup find a magnet and explore how it attracts metal. But when Pup finds a second magnet, they learn that two magnets may not be better than one!

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Ball - Dee encourages a friend to say ball and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep114
programme.desc: Crazy Golf - Laa-Laa shows Tinky Winky how to play crazy golf. Tinky Winky loves hitting the ball which travels up and down the hills of Teletubbyland and in to the Tiddlytubbies.

programme.title: Clangers (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Round and Round - Mother Clanger closes her garden to visitors to get a bit of peace. She never imagined the problems this would cause for the Soup Dragon and, ultimately, for Major Clanger.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep41
programme.desc: The Thing That Ruled - The Dinopaws meet REX who says that he is the ruler of the world, but they learn otherwise.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep54
programme.desc: Tulip Tool Up - Team Tinpo helps a flower grower in need of some flower picking power.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep55
programme.desc: Truck Wallop - The Delivery Po returns... and has an accident, causing a problem that she wants to put right herself.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep55
programme.desc: Monty Repeats Himself - A teacher asks Monty to paint something new instead of repeating himself, but Monty thinks repetition can sometimes be useful.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep76
programme.desc: Middle of Somewhere - The Kazoops family get lost in the middle of nowhere, but they soon discover a change of scenery can be as good as a holiday.

programme.title: Teddles (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Five More Minutes - Teddles and Cat-Cat want to carry on playing when Nanny Clock tells them it's bedtime.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: Cooking Up a Storm - Nelly and Nora have to get everything indoors before the big storm arrives.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: Sun Spots - Nora turns Nelly into a Sunflower.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep19
programme.desc: Basking Shark - Sarah is keen to adopt a sea creature, but doesn't get her first choice...

programme.desc: The Leaning Tower of Pisa, Italy - The Go Jetters race to fix the Leaning Tower of Pisa, but has it really been glitched?

programme.desc: Lake Titicaca, South America - What goes up must come down! Grandmaster Glitch lands with a splash in Lake Titicaca in South America.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Silence for Stan - When Stan is sick and resting in bed, Monty tries to find a quiet game to play but wonders if all the best games are noisy.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: Bob Bilby - When it's Bingo's turn to bring her Kindy's Bob Bilby puppet home and record their weekend in the scrapbook, the family resolve to show him a good time.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep11
programme.desc: The Pet Badge - The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: The Get Well Soon Badge - Oh dear, poor Norrie is sick. Can the squirrels think of something to cheer her up?

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: In Conversation with Pat Cummins
programme.desc: Pat Cummins, the first fast bowler to Captain the Australian mens test cricket team sits down with Tracey Holmes to discuss his dramatic rise to the top job and the future of Aussie cricket.

programme.title: ABC News Ep1
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: My Story
programme.desc: Six Australians share their own personal stories of living with disability. Presented by the ABC's Disability Affairs reporter Elizabeth Wright.

programme.title: Art Works Ep22
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - It's Arts Week on Art Works! We check out a new stage adaptation of Looking for Alibrandi; head to Minjerribah to see Megan Cope build an oyster reef on Country; and explore National Gallery of Victoria's Queer exhibition.

programme.title: Y2K: The Bug That Didn't Bite
programme.desc: 23 years ago the world overcame the Y2K crisis. John Barron looks at how Australia beat the millennium bug, a global panic over fears our computer systems would meltdown when the date hit 1/1/2000.

programme.title: ABC News Ep1
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, with reporters on the ground to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: Language and Me
programme.desc: A look at the role language plays for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people, highlighting the work done by language custodians to preserve this important aspect of our cultural and social lives. Hosted by Jack Evans.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep1
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Compass Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 36 - Youth advocate and influencer Yasmin Poole, presents this election episode with a focus on the rise of female independents and a return to ethics and community values in politics.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep1
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. We have reporters on the ground following the story and the issues that matter.

programme.title: A Girl's Guide To Hunting, Fishing And Wild Cooking Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Analiese settles in for winter and makes a big decision to transform the derelict vet clinic attached to her cottage into a commercial kitchen. She cooks up a feast to celebrate the year of adventures with her new community.

programme.title: Gardening Australia: New Year's Family Special 2017
programme.desc: The Gardening Australia team prepare for summer in the garden. Costa visits a miniature garden; herbs to take on holiday; what to plant in January; we revisit the Karen refugee vegetable garden.

programme.title: The World In 2022 - Asia Pacific
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor looks at the big stories that shaped our region in 2022. From the Hunga Tonga eruption, to the assassination of Shinzo Abe, and China's push for power in the Pacific - the region has changed forever.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia Ep41
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Michael Parkinson interviews guest Shane Warne.

programme.title: Compass Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 36 - Youth advocate and influencer Yasmin Poole, presents this election episode with a focus on the rise of female independents and a return to ethics and community values in politics.

programme.title: Art Works Ep22
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - It's Arts Week on Art Works! We check out a new stage adaptation of Looking for Alibrandi; head to Minjerribah to see Megan Cope build an oyster reef on Country; and explore National Gallery of Victoria's Queer exhibition.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep1
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep22
programme.desc: The planning failures deepening Australia's flood crisis. Adam Harvey meets families struggling with current and past flood events. They tell stories of despair, abandonment, and financial ruin. Many have lost everything.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep1
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news.

programme.title: The World In 2022
programme.desc: From Port Moresby's beauty queens to Russian prisoners of war, The World host Beverley O'Connor presents some of the most memorable reports from the ABC's team of international correspondents in 2022.

programme.title: Cabinet Papers 2002
programme.desc: On January 1, the National Archives unlock a trove of confidential Cabinet documents after 20 years have passed. Minister for Family and Community Services Amanda Vanstone speaks about the release of Cabinet Papers from 2002.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Series Ep1
programme.desc: How deep will the housing downturn go? We speak to property analysts, economists and real estate agents about whether prices will rebound in 2023 plus top tips on buying or selling in this market. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: National Press Club Address Ep34
programme.desc: Cate Campbell, Georgina Long and Richard Scolyer speak about the melanoma crisis in a Press Club event 'Game On Mole - urgent action required to tackle melanoma, which claims more Australian lives than our annual road toll'.

programme.title: Fault Lines 2022
programme.desc: We thought we'd beaten COVID, until war and economic strife, protest and authoritarianism reminded us how rapidly things can change in a connected world. War, inflation and an unfolding climate crisis sets the scene for 2023.

programme.title: The World In 2022 - Asia Pacific
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor looks at the big stories that shaped our region in 2022. From the Hunga Tonga eruption, to the assassination of Shinzo Abe, and China's push for power in the Pacific - the region has changed forever.

programme.title: Y2K: The Bug That Didn't Bite
programme.desc: 23 years ago the world overcame the Y2K crisis. John Barron looks at how Australia beat the millennium bug, a global panic over fears our computer systems would meltdown when the date hit 1/1/2000.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 8 - Heather Ewart sets course for Port Campbell on Victoria's Shipwreck Coast, known for its wild weather and dangerous seas.

programme.title: ABC News Video Lab Ep17
programme.desc: The ABC News Video Lab explains the events and issues making news in Australia and around the world. In this episode the Earth's population passes 8 billion people, plus the ACT decriminalises hard drugs.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep1
programme.desc: There's always something new to talk about over breakfast. Michael Rowland and Nour Haydar bring you the latest overnight developments plus news and interviews, Michael Rennie with sport, and Emma Rebellato with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep1
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Joe O'Brien in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep1
programme.desc: Dan Bourchier brings you the latest news and today's top stories. Right around Australia, in the Pacific and around the world ABC News has reporters on the ground covering news as it unfolds and the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 30 - Jane Edmanson goes farming on Lord Howe Island, Millie Ross discovers the secret lives of sunflowers, Tino Carnevale offers solutions for sloping gardens, and Josh Byrne plants semi-tropical edibles on his sunny deck area.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Rookie Dan returns to Coober Pedy a new Dad and newly determined to find more white opal. Col's Crew raise the stakes forking out thousands of dollars on an ancient and dangerous exploration drill rig.

programme.title: Next Gen Agriculture Ep1
programme.desc: Twenty years ago rural leaders were alarmed by young people's perceived declining interest in rural jobs and lives. But as this episode of Landline's Next Gen Agriculture series shows, it's a different story now.

programme.title: Small Island Big Song: An Oceanic Songline
programme.desc: This grassroots musical follows the ocean highways uniting ancient musical lineages. A heartfelt plea for environmental awareness and cultural preservation from those on the frontline of the climate crisis.

programme.title: ABC News Summer Ep1
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.desc: The ABC News Video Lab explains the events and issues making news in Australia and around the world. In this episode the Earth's population passes 8 billion people, plus the ACT decriminalises hard drugs.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep1

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep1
programme.desc: When you need to know what's happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you the day's events from reporters in more locations across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep1
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. We have reporters on the ground following the story and the issues that matter.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 8 - Heather Ewart sets course for Port Campbell on Victoria's Shipwreck Coast, known for its wild weather and dangerous seas.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep1
programme.desc: More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter to you. With a network of reporters across Australia and around the globe we uncover important stories and news as it unfolds.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep16
programme.desc: Did you know that a few beers with friends could actually be considered a funeral? Step inside the revolutionary not-for-profit funeral service that's saving people thousands.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep1

programme.desc: Raden, the iridescent sheen of Kyoto craftwork. Dive deep into the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: In a deep mountain valley near the Jozankei hot spring resorts, two fishermen searching for large char traverse past waterfalls towards the headwaters and catch the illusory fish as beautiful as gems!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! Two acts are coming to chat and perform. Omoinotake are a piano-based three-piece band with a growing fanbase. Not Equal ME are an idol group with a new, fourth single.

programme.title: Easy Japanese For Work
programme.desc: Pointing out a senior coworker's mistake. Kyaw Swar Aung, from Myanmar, works behind the scenes at Narita Airport. He'll tackle a roleplay challenge in which he notices a senior worker's mistake.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Meet kitties in an alleyway in hilly Nagasaki, see a white kitty relax and hunt around Peace Park, and enjoy kitty heaven at Unzen Jigoku hot springs before noisy humans arrive.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: 84-year-old Ueno Toshio has been a traffic guard for 25 years. He directs cars and pedestrians safely with deft precision and a human touch. But the pride he has in his job has been hard-won.

programme.title: Doki Doki! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce "Anime Supernova" showing Yano Honami who has been a creator to watch out for. The way she implements new techniques in each work has garnered critical acclaim worldwide.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions (28 Min.)
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: landmine clearance machines & linear guides.

programme.title: 100 Ideas To Save The World
programme.desc: About 30% of Japan's population is over 65. Against the backdrop of an increasingly aging society, this episode introduces the stories about supporting and staying present in the lives of the elderly.

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking that we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "Algorithm March"...

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Noumea is the capital of the French territory of New Caledonia, the jewel of the South Pacific. In this episode we stroll through the city meeting inhabitants who enjoy life in this island paradise.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Inspiring Landscapes
programme.desc: This program portrays the natural beauty still to be found all over Japan by following the scenery and wildlife through the seasons. Sapporo in winter. Unknown nature that has survived urbanization.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: This episode features two fabulous foreigners in Tokyo - US-born magazine editor Lucas Badtke-Berkow who invites us to discover the capital's many trees, and nail artist Nial Khan Cing from Myanmar.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan #2
programme.desc: "50 rejections changed my life." Marvin is from Brunei. He now works as a data analyst after he was turned down by 50 companies in his job search. What insight did he gain from his experience?

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Origami Magic
programme.desc: Origami is magic made from a single sheet of paper. This program showcases lively origami animals made by Hoang Tien Quyet, an origami artist living in Vietnam.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Bitoh Tomomi came in second place in the women's race of the 2021 Marathon des Sables, a 250 km multi-stage run across the Sahara Desert. She talks about her passion for pushing her limits.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: The power of haiku poems resonates worldwide. In 2021, an effort was made to share thoughts via haiku in many languages. What is revealed when we express our thoughts on life in just 17 syllables?

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Reading Japan
programme.desc: Short stories by Japan's leading writers, read in English. The illustrations draw you deeper into the world of Japanese life. Today's episode is "The Fugu Returns the Favor" by Tamaru Masatomo.

programme.title: Seasoning The Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition #6
programme.desc: This episode features Japanese companies that are making solar energy even more environmentally friendly by focusing on ways to reuse or recycle used solar panels.

programme.title: Pandemic History, Info & Tips
programme.desc: How can we associate better with COVID-19? Let's find the key by learning about the history of the infectious diseases Japan has experienced. This time: Notices Instead of Vaccine.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! Two acts are coming to chat and perform. Omoinotake are a piano-based three-piece band with a growing fanbase. Not Equal ME are an idol group with a new, fourth single.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Ceramic Treasures
programme.desc: Today: Onta-yaki, Oita Prefecture. We will visit the potters from all over Japan and discover their ceramics heritage by introducing the culture and historical background.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments
programme.desc: A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: The Mark Of Beauty
programme.desc: Tsumugi kimono has long been weaved from silk by farmers during the off-season and reflects the climate of its birthplace. Witness the beauty of handmade floss silk, mud-dyeing, and tensan silk.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep3
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep1
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
